title.narrative: Fra barn til borger - holistiske tilgange til barnebeskyttelse i Xinjiang. 2. fase

description.narrative: The overall objective of the project is to enable minority children in Xinjiang to fulfil their right to protection from abuse, neglect and exploitation being particularly at risk due to poverty and migration. The specific purpose is thus to enable vulnerable children in Xinjiang to make safe and productive choices in life, and to improve their access to information relevant to protect their health and future job opportunities by improving their leaning in non-academic areas such as life skill education. The primary target group is children between 6 and 12 years old in Korla and Hotan as well as teachers and principals in primary schools. The secondary target groups are parents, citizens in local communities, civil society organisations and local education authorities.
